comment:
* A class representing a UWB address
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static UwbAddress fromBytes(@NonNull byte[] address)
methods.comment:
* Create a {@link UwbAddress} from a byte array. * *

If the provided array is {@link #SHORT_ADDRESS_BYTE_LENGTH} bytes, a short address is * created. If the provided array is {@link #EXTENDED_ADDRESS_BYTE_LENGTH} bytes, then an * extended address is created. * * @param address a byte array to convert to a {@link UwbAddress} * @return a {@link UwbAddress} created from the input byte array * @throws IllegalArgumentException when the length is not one of * {@link #SHORT_ADDRESS_BYTE_LENGTH} or {@link #EXTENDED_ADDRESS_BYTE_LENGTH} bytes

methods.name: public byte[] toBytes()
public int size()
methods.comment:
* The length of the address in bytes *

Possible values are {@link #SHORT_ADDRESS_BYTE_LENGTH} and * {@link #EXTENDED_ADDRESS_BYTE_LENGTH}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public static UwbAddress fromBytes(@NonNull byte[] address)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
